channel.title: Hardware schematics, PCB layout etc
channel.description: Are the hardware design files, i.e schemos, PCB layout ( e.g Eagle files ), BOMs... available somewhere ? And if not would you be able to add them to Github in the spirit of open source :) ? I think it'd be really pedagogic, and also interesting to see what people do with it. I'd be quite interested myself to have a poke and to look into things like adapting the design for Eurorack.

item.title: Hardware schematics, PCB layout etc
item.dc:creator: @Diego Diego de Leon
item.description:
@Diego wrote:

Any news on that?
Can't find source files

Read full topic

item.title: Hardware schematics, PCB layout etc
item.dc:creator: @matthewcieplak Matthew Cieplak
item.description:
@matthewcieplak wrote:

Not sure if you guys have already seen this, but there's an Axoloti Core Schematic 1.0 document on the main site now. And the stated dimensions on the site are 160x50mm - the hard part of course is positioning the cutouts for the threaded jacks...

Read full topic

item.title: Hardware schematics, PCB layout etc
item.dc:creator: @DazzlingDuke Daniel D Lindmark
item.description:
@DazzlingDuke wrote:

Johannes, is there any update on releasing source files? Will you announce it on this thread, or should we look elsewhere?

Really looking forward to building a great instrument with this!

Daniel D Lindmark

Read full topic

item.title: Hardware schematics, PCB layout etc
item.dc:creator: @byteborg Karsten W. Rohrbach
item.description:
@byteborg wrote:

Do you have a mechanical spec with measurement layer handy?
Would be helpful for enclosre design. I'd like to design and print one and I'd rather not reverse-engineer the measurements, effectively invalidating fit and tolerance.

Read full topic

item.title: Hardware schematics, PCB layout etc

item.description:
@lysander wrote:

Excellent news ! Looking forward to it.
I can't wait to receive my Axoloti either.

item.title: Hardware schematics, PCB layout etc
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Hardware design files are not released yet, I need to do some redaction work on them. Doing that now would delay shipping. But sure they will be opened up!

Read full topic

@lysander wrote:

Are the hardware design files, i.e schemos, PCB layout ( e.g Eagle files ), BOMs... available somewhere ?
And if not would you be able to add them to Github in the spirit of open source ?
I think it'd be really pedagogic, and also interesting to see what people do with it.
I'd be quite interested myself to have a poke and to look into things like adapting the design for Eurorack.
